attributes.action: Ken Bates Out of Leeds United
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, The Leeds United fans of the UK, would like Mr Ken Bates to resign his position as Chairman of Leeds United AFC. The fans have great concern that your interests are far from the aspect of football and money is your only desire. Therefore it is time you stepped aside and allowed someone with Leeds United close to their hearts to take control and take the football team back to where they belong.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
